description:
cmd/ld, runtime: clean up CL 9666047

Remove unnecessary ( ) around == in && clause.
Add { } around multiline if body, even though it's one statement.

Add runtime: prefix to printed errors.

messages.text:
Hello cshapiro (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6dad366e9f94 ***

cmd/ld, runtime: clean up CL 9666047

Remove unnecessary ( ) around == in && clause.
Add { } around multiline if body, even though it's one statement.

Add runtime: prefix to printed errors.

R=cshapiro, iant
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 9685047: cmd/ld, runtime: clean up CL 9666047
